name: Outta Control Dude
description:
Outta Control Dude

He may be a little guy but he is out of control.

You can slow down -- a little You can steer -- a little You can jump -- a little You can lose control a lot GMTK Game Jam 2020

This game was developed in less then 48 hours during the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam of 2020. The theme is "Out of control" and this game takes that to the next level. 

First we take a sport which requires its participants to live on the line between "in control" and at the mercy of the mountain. Snowboarding.

What's unique about this game is to increase your score faster you can enable specific "features". These difficulty modes take away control from the player and give it to randomness

I hope you have fun playing Outta Control Dude!

Live Video Logs

During the jam I posted (almost) live, vlogs as the game progressed. Check out the Devlogs
